product_name: Patagonia Stretch Planing Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Stretch Planing board shorts are a lighter, trimmer version of the tried-and-true Wavefarer board shorts, and they have functional 2-way stretch so you can maneuver into breaking waves. Stretchy, quick-drying ripstop polyester fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes water to bead up and roll off. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Forward inseam at the crotch eliminates chafing; flat-lying, single-button fly and a contoured waistband with a drawstring closure ensure a comfortable fit. Self-draining zippered pocket on right thigh secures small essentials; pocket includes an internal key loop. The Patagonia Stretch Wavefarer board shorts have a regular fit; hem hits at the knee.
